column4: there's a two line command on http://ubuntulinux.nl/source-o-matic , use the key that is mentioned in the error.
and, whatever you do, don't do an apt-get upgrade with that repo enabled, and disable it as soon as you have libdvdcss
yes, I'm only getting libdvdcss2 and w32codecs from it, then I disable it.
